tool_description: World countries available in multiple languages, with associated alpha-2, alpha-3, and numeric codes as defined by the ISO 3166 standard.

api_list.name: get a country by alpha-2 numeric code
api_list.description: Retrieve information about a specific country using its ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code, which is a two-letter country code.

required_parameters.name: alpha-2-code
required_parameters.description: The two-letter country code as defined by ISO 3166-1.

api_list.name: get all countries
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of all countries recognized by the ISO 3166 standard.
